mainMessage.title: Your Presence is Our Present
mainMessage.description: The most important gift to us is having you celebrate our special day!
mainMessage.subtitle: However, if you'd like to contribute to our future together, we've created some options below.

honeymoon.title: Honeymoon Fund
honeymoon.description: Help us create amazing memories in Lorem Island, Greece!
honeymoon.details: We're planning a 10-day honeymoon to explore the islands, enjoy local cuisine, and relax by the Aegean Sea.
honeymoon.cashCheckDetails: Feel free to give at the wedding reception

charity.title: Charity Donations
charity.description: If you prefer to make a charitable donation in our honor, these causes are close to our hearts:

thankYou.message: We're so grateful for your love and support as we begin this new chapter together.
thankYou.celebration: Can't wait to celebrate with you!
